verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In the Bizarro World of the Trump administration] , it [V: ’s] [ARG2: only fitting] [ARG1: that the president serves as publicity director for James Comey ’s big book tour] .
In the Bizarro World of the Trump administration , it ’s only fitting that [ARG0: the president] [V: serves] [ARG1: as publicity director for James Comey ’s big book tour] .
